data.title: Watch Mad Max 2: The Road Warrior
data.meta_description: Watch Mad Max 2: The Road Warrior and more new movie premieres on Max. Plans start at $9.99/month. A loner stalks Australia's Outback for fuel after WWIII has destroyed most of civilization. Mel Gibson stars in this thrilling fantasy adventure. Directed by George Miller; written by Terry Hayes & George Miller with Brian Hannant.

About This Movie

A loner stalks Australia's Outback for fuel after WWIII has destroyed most of civilization. Mel Gibson stars in this thrilling fantasy adventure. Directed by George Miller; written by Terry Hayes & George Miller with Brian Hannant.
